/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a canopy of greenery over the urban landscape. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. A motorcycle is parked on the street, hinting at the city's preferred mode of transportation. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the blend of nature and architecture that characterizes Beijing.
